answers.answer:

related_questions.question:
(Sco    Mr. Ringo : Who is the best chef in your family?
Penny
Mr. ringo Really? I thought your father don't know how to cook!​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Mr. Ringo : Who is the best chef in your family?

Penny: My father is the best chef in my family.

Mr. ringo Really? I thought your father doesn't know how to cook!​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Present Tense karena menjelaskan tentang fakta.

Simple Present Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + tobe (is/am/are) + Noun (kata benda)

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Anton,_____, passed away yesterday morning    a. to whom I talked last week
b. to which I talked last week
c. to who I talked last week
d. to whose I talked last week
e. to where I talked last week
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a) to whom I talked last week

Penjelasan:

kita pakai relative clause whom saat membicarakan object di sebuah kalimat:

- kata 'I' merupakan subject karena 'I' berada di belakang verb 'talked', artinya yang berbicara itu saya

- sedangkan kata 'Anton' disini adalah object menunjukkan kepada siapa saya berbicara

Jawaban:

The teacher gave some work yesterday

Penjelasan:

Karena kata give nya di kurung jadi saya pikir harus diubah menjadi past tense ^^

Semoga bermanfaat ^^

-Lily ✨

Jawaban:

The teacher gave some works yesterday

Penjelasan:

Kita menggunakan past tense jika waktu sudah lewat, misal nya I ate this food yesterday, otomatis kan sudh kemarin jadi pakai pas tense

Maaf kalau salah yaa\

-Clarissa

related_questions.question: Tolong yang bisa bantu soal diatas

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Hey, Happy Birthday! You're (Age) Now, You're very grown and wise congrats!

Congratulations on your Graduation! we're all very proud of you!

Congratulations! It's a beautiful and healthy baby boy/girl

Oh my, Congratulations on your Wedding! Hope you two live a happy life together

Congrats on passing the Exam! You're a very diligent student

Semoga membantu dan menjadi jawaban terbaik ya :)

related_questions.question:
18. Wulan     : What is your plan tonight?
Arbi
: I will watch a movie at home
Wulan : What movie are you going to watch?
Arbi : I don't know yet. Perhaps I will watch drama movie.
Wulan : You should watch education movie. It's good to add our knowledge.
Arbi : It sounds good to me.
The underline sentence in the dialogue above shows the expression of....
a. asking for plan
d. giving advice
b. asking for help
e. giving information
C. asking for advice
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. Asking for plan.

Penjelasan:

Ini jawabannnya ya.

Terima Kasih.

klo salah maap ya :)

related_questions.question: Membuat kalimat positif present perfect dengan kata kerja forget​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I have forgotten learn English for one week.

Penjelasan:

forgotten adalah irreguler verb dari forget.

Present perfect tense

didefinisikan sebagai suatu bentuk kata kerja yang digunakan untuk menyatakan suatu aksi atau situasi yang telah dimulai di masa lalu dan masih berlanjut sampai sekarang atau telah selesai pada suatu titik waktu tertentu di masa lalu namun efeknya masih berlanjut.

Rumus Present Perfect Tense :

Subject + has/have + verb 3
